Johnson Monument: Chippewa Falls Headstones, Gravestones & Tombstones  Skip to content Johnson Monument | Memorials | Chippewa Falls, WI Cremation Products Pet Memorials Contact FREE Virtual Consult 715-723-5576 Markers ALL Markers Cemetery grave markers for one to four graves Flat Granite Markers Bronze Markers Raised Markers Related Resources Customization Granite Colors Request a Brochure ALL RESOURCES Monuments Beautiful upright cemetery monuments for your beloved family members. Single Grave Monuments Two Grave Monuments Family Monuments Benches Mausoleums Mausoleums Overview The ultimate option for those wishing to leave a lasting family legacy. Mausoleum Gallery How Mausoleums Are Designed & Built Order a Mausoleum Veterans & Community specific All Veterans & Community Projects Lasting tributes to honor those in your community. Veterans Memorials Bronze Plaques Community Projects Signage Services All Services Professional services to keep your memorial looking as beautiful as the day it was purchased. Cleaning Cemetery Lettering Maintenance Other Services Resources X Veterans Markers Cemetery Guidelines Epitaphs for Headstones How to Order Things to know before buying a headstone The Headstone Purchasing Process FAQ Special Offers Toggle navigation Search Memorials as unique as the loved ones they honor Flat VIEW DETAILS Raised Upright Private Since 1917, families have trusted Johnson Monument Company to create timeless tributes to honor their loved ones. Our expert staff and talented craftsmen will design and carve your memorial with the time and attention it deserves. ABOUT US Public Works Did you know Johnson Monument is also active in the public sector?  We have partnered with many municipalities, veterans’ organizations, colleges, churches, forest preserves, and park districts to provide commemorative and donor recognition pieces.  Visit our galleries to see just a few examples of our work. VIEW ALL A video is being shown Close modal window Here to Guide You Every Step of the Way We understand that most people have never purchased a headstone before and are unsure where to begin.  Our memorial specialists will guide you through the granite selection and design process and will coordinate the carving, delivery, and installation of your memorial at the cemetery.  They will be your single point of contact, making the process simple and convenient.  For an overview of the headstone purchasing process, watch the short video below. Customization & Pricing In-Cemetery Services Services such as adding information to an existing memorial as well as cleaning and maintenance are performed on-site in the cemetery.  Check out the services links below to learn more. Onsite Engraving View All Previous Next Adding an inscription to an existing memorial, like a name or date of death, can be done right in the cemetery. LEARN MORE Restore your memorial to it's original beauty by having it professionally cleaned or refinished. Memorial maintenance such as leveling, straightening and resealing, are just a few of the services our expert staff can provide. 1 2 3 Testimonials "Everything was beautiful.  I will be referring family friends and spreading the word.  Wonderful!!!" L. Hiller, "We saw the memorial this past weekend and could not be more pleased.  Thank you for a job well done!" W. & C. Wilder, "Just a few words of extended thanks for the marvelous service, warm expression of kindness and patience. I knew I would be pleased, but my daughter's memorial is much more beautiful than I imagined. Now when I visit my daughter's memorial, I receive a little more comfort and peace." S. Patterson, "The headstone is absolutely beautiful.  Our late mom would've loved it." D. Herr, "We absolutely loved the headstone and got it way sooner than we thought." D. Brockert, "During our time of sadness, you were helpful and kind." K. Kampa, "Beautiful work, exactly as ordered." K. Dee, "It was beautiful.  My family and I love it. Thank you so much." B. Minor, We Are Here to Help We’re here to help you with this emotional and unfamiliar purchase. Stop in at any of our locations phone email Get An Estimate Serving the Chippewa Valley for 100 years.
